panels.description: Shows rate of execution for compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket by compaction resolution.

targets.expr: sum by (job, resolution) (rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of executed compactions against blocks that are stored in the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_group_compactions_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for downsampling against blocks that are stored in the bucket by compaction resolution.

targets.expr: sum by (job, resolution) (rate(thanos_compact_downsample_total{job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of executed downsampling against blocks that are stored in the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_downsample_failed_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_downsample_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for removals of blocks if their data is available as part of a block with a higher compaction level.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_garbage_collection_total{job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of executed garbage collections.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_garbage_collection_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_garbage_collection_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to execute garbage collection in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_compact_garbage_collection_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_compact_garbage_collection_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_compact_garbage_collection_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows deletion rate of blocks already marked for deletion.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_blocks_cleaned_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Deletion Rate

panels.description: Shows deletion failures rate of blocks already marked for deletion.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_block_cleanup_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Deletion Error Rate

panels.description: Shows rate at which blocks are marked for deletion (from GC and retention policy).

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_compact_blocks_marked_for_deletion_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Marking Rate

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for all meta files from blocks in the bucket into the memory.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_blocks_meta_syncs_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of executed meta file sync.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_blocks_meta_sync_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_blocks_meta_syncs_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to execute meta file sync, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_blocks_meta_sync_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_blocks_meta_sync_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_blocks_meta_sync_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for operations against the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job, operation) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operations_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of executed operations against the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operations_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to execute operations against the bucket, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

targets.expr: go_memstats_alloc_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
rate(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[30s])
rate(go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[30s])
go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_goroutines{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_gc_duration_seconds{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
